review_body: Fantastic camera and screen quality. Really liked the zoomdoesn't have the bells and whistles like my Motorola phone had. I'm stuck with it now for a couple of years UNFORTUNATELY.The only thing I like better is the camera feature.have no complaints!

review_title: Great phone with a horrible battery
review_body: This phone is fast and the camera is the best I have had, however, it runs out of battery just sitting there overnight. I don't know if I got a dud battery or a returned phone, but it is horrible. I have never had a phone with such a bad battery right out of the box.

review_title: Does not work with Spectrum wireless service.
review_body: Phone does not port with Spectrum wireless service.
